info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 4:00PM MDT until July 02 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MCCONE...NORTH CENTRAL PRAIRIE AND WEST CENTRAL DAWSON COUNTIES... At 400 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles southeast of Brockway, or 17 miles south of Circle, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern McCone, north central Prairie and west central Dawson Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
